Text: Thank you so much.  Will seed.
Thanks so much.  My girlfriend is a foreigner and I've wanted her to see what a Muppet is.  What better way to introduce them to her than through the movie?
Thank you SO MUCH!  It's sad when a 7-year old doesn't know who the Muppets are...what is this world coming to?  :)
Thank you. Its great to be able to share this movie with my kids.
